name: permute
author: Ulrik Sandberg  <ulrik.sandberg -at- jayway.com>
description: A Node.js module with a very specific function, permute.core.sel_index, for returning the i:th element of the 1-n selections of a given string, where n is the length of the string. A 1 selection of [1 2] is just [1 2], a 2 selection of [1 2] is the cartesian product of [1 2] and [1 2], ie [[1 1] [1 2] [2 1] [2 2]]. However, sel_index works only with strings. For example, sel_index("abc", 0) => a, sel_index("abc", 3) => aa, sel_index("abc", 15) => aba, while sel_index("abc", 38) => ccc
